text: Virginia Field (4 November 1917 â€“ 2 January 1992) was a British actress. She played Ianthe in the movie The Primrose Path. She played Helena in the movie Ladies in Love (1936). Field was born in London, England. She died in California of cancer of unknown primary origin.
